title: Schools finally over...
content:
I just finished my end-of-year exams, and school is over. It didnt seem like the last year of school, time flies...

what am i going to do with my time now apart from continuing cks3 [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] ---------
[img]http://img250.echo.cx/img250/9885/comicstrip9vf.gif[/img]

title: Re: Schools finally over...
content:
Whoa!!! Hold up!!!

END OF SCHOOL: It isn't even winter, and your out of school???

R u in some other hemisphere?

Or... are you graduating from collage, and therefore, you have no more school left ever?

Man... I wish I were out of school.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

I am omly 1/3 through the year...Tough Guys Can Fix There Own Problems!!!

title: Re: Schools finally over...
content:
You guys are lucky that your alst year is so short, we have to do a full year of examinations here and this year there are twice as normal for me.-----------------
